author: lukaszrozmej
content:
Hi <@401247135934447637> we have some proof of concept and next steps here: https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/3888 , we can have a chat if needed. I can probably grab Szymon who is the original author of this code too.

Note that we are leveraging excellent run-time reflection, including code generation in .Net here. Which is not that easy in some other languages/frameworks/platforms.

At least until now, this was explored with a purpose to ship it in Nethermind client as we are focusing on applied engineering rather than just research.
